string.name: name
string.value: To the Energy Laboratory
A Mapler who seems to have arrived before you is hiding amongst the grass.\r\nYou should start a conversation.

You discovered the location of the Crystanol Fragment. You must take the portal to the right of #b#p9250130##k and continue until you reach the Energy Laboratory. If you meet aliens on the way, hide in the grass.
You arrived at the Energy Laboratory. \r\nBut there is an Anti-Theft Laser preventing your approach. What to do?
Did you come in a Time Machine? I just got here myself, a few hours ago. Things are crazy in the future!\r\n#L0##bWhat do you mean?#l\n#k
Aliens! Aliens everywhere! The world has been overrun by aliens! It's awful! \r\n#L0##bNo... That can't be... We must change this!#l\n#k
Don't just stand there! They'll find you! \r\n#L0##bWhat do you suggest I do then?#l\n#k
Hide! Hide in the grass, like me. If you see any aliens around, hide in the grass, quick as you can. r\n#L0##bI'll do that. Thanks for the tip.#l\n#k
I suppose you're looking for a #b#t4001458##k, too, right?\r\n#L0##bYes. Have you found any?#l\n#k
SHHHHHHHH!!! NOT SO LOUD!!!! \r\n#L0##bMy apologies... (It's like the pot calling the kettle black. Sheesh.)#l\n#k
That's better. \r\nNow, I've found out a few things. Want to hear?
It turns out, the future Doctor Bing indeed manage to create Crystanol. I've even found out where he keeps it. Someone who obtained some earlier told me...
Just take that portal to the right. Follow the path until you get to the Energy Laboratory. It's in there.
Problem is, that building's crawling with aliens. Guess they like Crystanol, too. \r\nSecurity's tight, so you'll have to be careful.
I'm still getting my bearings. \r\nYou go on ahead.
Suit yourself. Just keep your head down and don't let them find me.
Argh. Grrr. How am I supposed to get inside? Argh! Grrr! \r\n#L0##bHi there...#l\n#k
EEP! You scared the living daylights out of me! I thought you were an alien!\r\n#L0##bPeople around here seem awfully jumpy. Sorry for scaring you.#l\n#k
I'm surprised another human made it this far. You must be stronger than you look. \r\n#L0##bEr... Thank you?#l\n#k
I guess you're here to get some Crystanol, too.
Unfortunately, this place is covered with a web of anti-theft lasers.
I think we can pass through using the #bTeleport Device#k located here, but I can't get it to work. Looks as if the power is off.
So, what now? \r\nIf we stay here beyond the #b<Time Restriction>#k, the aliens will find us for sure...
